zones.message: Importing test files in non-test files is not allowed.
Importing mock modules in non-test files is not allowed.
Importing testing utilities in non-test files is not allowed.

patterns.message: Usage of relative parent imports is not allowed.

no-restricted-syntax.message: for..in loops iterate over the entire prototype chain, which is virtually never what you want. Use Object.{keys,values,entries}, and iterate over the resulting array.
Labels are a form of GOTO; using them makes code confusing and hard to maintain and understand.
`with` is disallowed in strict mode because it makes code impossible to predict and optimize.
